price: 42. Dheh: “Yaa idinka ilaalin kara habeen iyo maalinba (Cadaabka) Naxariistaha (Allaah)? Waxayse iyagu ka jeesadaan xusidda Rabbigood.
arabic: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wal-nahāri mina al-raḥmāni bal hum ʿan dhik'ri rabbihim muʿ'riḍūna
